title: List of children of the prime ministers of India
text:
The children of prime ministers of India have been the subject of widespread public attention. There are 41 children of former prime ministers of India.
Several of the children of former prime ministers have entered politics. Two have become prime ministers themselves.
<a href="P.%20V.%20Narasimha%20Rao">P. V. Narasimha Rao</a> had 8 children, the most of any prime minister. Two prime ministers - <a href="Atal%20Bihari%20Vajpayee">Atal Bihari Vajpayee</a> and <a href="Narendra%20Modi">Narendra Modi</a> - have had no biological children. However, Vajpayee had an adoptive daughter while Modi has raised a Nepalese boy.
Narendra Modi.
Narendra Modi has no biological or adoptive children. He took and started to raise a Nepalese migrant boy Jeet Bahadur Saru Magar in 1998 who had entered India crossing <a href="India%E2%80%93Nepal%20border">India–Nepal border</a> and handed him over back to his family in 2014 when he was 27 years old.
